mapper.select: SELECT cb.c_board_no, cb.c_board_title, cb.c_board_content, cb.c_board_reg_date, cb.c_board_view_cnt, u.user_nickname FROM community_board cb JOIN user u ON cb.board_user_no = u.user_no;

SELECT cb.c_board_no, cb.c_board_file_no, cb.c_board_title, cb.c_board_content, cb.c_board_reg_date, cb.c_board_view_cnt, u.user_nickname, f.file_no, f.file_name, f.file_path, f.file_system_name FROM community_board cb JOIN user u ON cb.board_user_no = u.user_no LEFT JOIN files f ON cb.c_board_no = f.board_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community_board ( c_board_file_no, c_board_title, c_board_content, board_user_no ) VALUES ( #{boardFileNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardUserNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE community_board SET c_board_title = #{boardTitle}, c_board_content = #{boardContent} WHERE c_board_no = #{boardNo};
UPDATE files SET file_name = #{fileName}, file_path = #{filePath}, file_system_name = #{fileSystemName} WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} AND file_no = #{fileNo};
